recipe_name: Lollipop chicken with honey and sesame seeds
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Soak two wooden skewers in a bowl of cold water for ten minutes.  Thread the chicken onto the skewers and drizzle over half of the olive oil.  Heat a griddle pan until smoking and cook the chicken skewers for 4-5 minutes on both sides, or until golden-brown and cooked through. Drizzle over the honey and sprinkle over the sesame seeds.  To serve, place the chicken skewers onto a serving plate. Toss the parsley leaves with the remaining olive oil and drizzle on the plate next to the chicken skewers.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz chicken breast, cut into strips,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp honey,  1 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted,  1 small handful fresh parsley leaves
